review:
I've used Barter since the first web-only version was launched, and now the mobile app has more or less replaced my bank app. The thing I love the most about Barter is how it simplifies difficult things and makes it easy to send money to anyone anywhere in the world. I've taken to insisting that all my friends and family use Barter for money requests. 

The app lets you buy airtime, pay certain utility bills, and send money to any bank account anywhere in the world. My favorite features are the ability to create virtual Visa Dollar cards as well as the nearby feature which lets you send money to people near you. I switched my app store to the US store and now use my dollar card to pay for everything, from Apple Music to in-app purchase to subscriptions. 

Also, the ability to request money is a godsend!!!! I've found it especially helpful because I do not like confrontation and would rather not ask when someone owes me money. 

Last thing, bank transfers are cheaper when you do local transfers. I'm just saying.
title: This App Is A Lifesaver!

review: I don‚Äôt usually do this and so far I have seen people with the app on the phone but don‚Äôt use it cause  been scared they could loose out their money , well good enough I have conducted transactions worth millions of naira and leave the millions hanging in the account and still can use it well the spending limit makes spenders like us remember I can run out of my own money when it‚Äôs there but can‚Äôt spend it so it makes me even more reasonably considerate on spending money ,  I am a proud user and I love you BARTER and the entire team but keep improving for better please ! Let‚Äôs critics talk all they want you are my own best financial service app!!!
title: Great Great service app!

review: It‚Äôs funny how you never have a problem funding the barter account but always have a problem withdrawing from the account. I opened my first barter account, I funded it, then I am asked to provide my bvn for verification I did, it shows successful but still anytime I want to authenticate a transaction the bvn verification box still always pops up, the exact same cycle over and over again. I resulted to opening another account, I made a transaction and got debited on my bank account but it didn‚Äôt reflect on my barter account. My funds got freezes in both of the barter accounts I created. I could boldly say this is a scam and it should be taken down down so many more people don‚Äôt fall victim, my poor review and rating are subjected to review if I get an immideate response and solution.
title: Pathetic my funds are hanging in the app

review: I started with Alat, all went well for a while then it just stopped working. I learnt of Barter on a blog, installed it as well, found out it was still affiliated to Wema bank, shrugged my shoulders and gave it a shot anyway. Started well, until I found out the hard way that US dollars added at current exchange rate, could only be withdrawn at a significantly lower rate, well the bloody banks are pretty much running the same scam. Now, the app has also gone the way of Alat, it isn‚Äôt just working. Thank God I withdrew most of what I had there in time, leaving the equivalent of just $2. I think i‚Äôll just stick to my physical card backed by a more serious bank. Goodbye Alat or Barter, or whatever new name you guys are gonna call yourselves.
title: Alat, Barter...same crap, different day
developerResponse: {'id': 19643228, 'body': 'Hello Bassey, we will like to assure you that Barter is a product of Fluttterwave, Not WEMA, the WEMA bank account option is strictly for funding your wallet, we deeply apologize for the less than satisfactory experience.', 'modified': '2020-12-09T10:15:10Z'}

review:
I love how I‚Äôm able to do transactions in Naira easily despite moving away from Nigeria. In addition to that, the app is way easier to use and requires less navigating than my other bank apps. It is even easier to log in. Another benefit is that transactions are either cheaper or free. 

My most impressive experience for me so far was that I was able to reconvert an iTunes gift card I bought and never used back to cash on the app. I doubt even Apple does that. üòÖ

So 5 stars from this thrift gal. ü•∞
title: Seamless
developerResponse: {'id': 20272441, 'body': 'We are pleased that you enjoyed the app. If there is anything we can do for you, just let us know at hi@flutterwavego.com!\n', 'modified': '2021-01-08T17:41:30Z'}

review: Hi, I started using barter a while ago, but I can now see that there haven't been any good updates for this app yet.  It's frustrating üò°üò°when I can receive unlimited payments and can only send 200,000 in one day that day, what if I have to pay someone a higher payment over 200,000?? Wait until next day!!! the first time I didn't know it was useless until I started using this app on a regular basis. This is so bad here and it would be great if you could update your system.  Now I just find one way to move 200,000 and everything I have through this app to my bank account every day as it is of no use to me.  I'll check back in a month or month if it's good I'll come back

developerResponse: {'id': 12600372, 'body': 'Hi ShahzaibA, we regret the inconvenience this has caused you and would love to take a look at the issue reported. We reviewed your transactions and observed that transactions on certain sites were declined. Kindly note that acceptance of the payment method used by a customer on a merchant site is solely dependent on the merchant as some merchant will decline transactions based on your IP address or attempts from a virtual prepaid card. However, should the merchant accept payments via PayPal, we recommend that you create a PayPal account (U.S. account), link your card and proceed with your transactions. Thank you for your understanding.  ', 'modified': '2019-12-26T19:26:59Z'}

title: Scam app
developerResponse:
{'id': 14548286, 'body': 'Hello, so sorry for any inconvenience. However the charge of USD1 for unsuccessful transactions is not charged by us, it is however charged by the site you intend to use this card on. 

Previously Barter incurred this fee however now it will be incurred by the customer.  

This article below should help explain better https://flutterwave.com/ng/blog/barter-by-flutterwave/a-uniform-premium-experience-for-everyone

The dollar rate displayed is a reflection of the rates available to us on the global parallel market and this constantly changes.

Please feel free to reach out to us via hi@flutterwavego.com and we will clarify further.', 'modified': '2020-04-08T18:28:47Z'}
